titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for funeral expenses to veterans of any war who were recipients of the Purple Heart award.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 8/6/1987--Introduced. Amends veterans' benefits provisions to authorize the Administrator of Veterans Affairs to extend burial and funeral expenses benefits to any veteran who was a Purple Heart award recipient.
